entries.title: Changelog Management System
entries.summary: Complete changelog system with UI integration, automation scripts, and roadmap linking
entries.description:
Implemented a comprehensive changelog management system for tracking product updates and improvements.

**Features Added:**
- Changelog UI view integrated into Projects section with timeline layout
- Filtering by category, quarter, and search functionality
- Expandable entry cards with detailed descriptions
- Category icons and visual indicators (feature, bugfix, improvement, security, deprecation)
- Impact level indicators (critical, high, medium, low)
- Roadmap integration with quarter-based grouping

**Automation Tools:**
- Git-based changelog generator (`generate-changelog.js`) that parses conventional commits
- Interactive CLI tool (`changelog-cli.js`) for manual entry management
- Support for conventional commit format (feat, fix, perf, security, deprecate)
- Automatic version and date handling

**Data Structure:**
- JSON-based storage with structured entry schema
- Support for linking to roadmap items and projects
- Metadata tracking (author, contributors, tags, impact)
- Status management (draft, scheduled, released, cancelled)

**Documentation:**
- Comprehensive implementation plan (CHANGELOG_PLAN.md)
- Usage guides and best practices
- Template files for different entry types
- Script documentation with examples

This system provides transparency for product updates and enables better communication with stakeholders about changes and improvements.
entries.author: Mec Zilla
